snippet: The group apologized to victims of its founder, who molested young seminarians and fathered several children with at least two women.
abstract: Roman Catholic order the Legionaries of Christ denounces its founder Rev Marcial Maciel Degollado, who lived double life as womanizer and pedophile, and apologizes to his victims; Degollado died in 2008.
lead_paragraph: The group apologized to victims of its founder, who molested young seminarians and fathered several children with at least two women.

headline.main: Legionaries of Christ Denounce Founder, Marcial Maciel Degollado
